title: Loading screen repitatively crashes when reconnecting to game (lost a ranked game due to remake).
body: I lost my first ranked game due to this bug where it would not load the loading screen in order to get into the game. I had to restart my game in order to play again. Thank you for helping!

replies.body: This is happening to me too please help

The only known issue with loading into games right now is listed on the Client Ticker and on the [**Service Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na):

> *"Weâ€™re aware that some players are receiving connection errors when loading into a game. If you get disconnected during loading screen and see a prompt to reconnect, please click the CANCEL button out of the error pop up and use the RECONNECT button on the client screen to quickly get back into the game."*

If this isn't exactly what you're experiencing, please let me know which error message you're seeing so we can work together to troubleshoot this.
